name: Scintillatron 4096
description:
Scintillatron 4096 is a compelling highscore shooter. It fuses retro gameplay origins with modern, pulsating visuals and a mood-setting electro soundtrack.

As you battle for glory in the world rankings, combo building is everything. Stick
to a single color for a big points boost. Manage it late game on one of the dreaded Last Waves and your score will skyrocket.

Local two player on PlayStation®4 brings extra game modes. We recommend you host a retro arcade party and enjoy some player vs player matches in
Battle Mode. Alternatively, play as a team in the co-op score attack with dedicated ranking boards.

45 trophies (some of which you’ll REALLY have to fight for), 16 combinable power-ups, PS4™Pro UHD at 60fps, and a fantastic skill-testing difficulty curve... welcome to Scintillatron 4096!

Purchasing this content entitles you to both the PS4™ system and “PS Vita” system versions!

Remote Play requires PS Vita system and sufficiently robust Wi-Fi connection.

1-2 players
460MB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
Remote Play
